channel.title: Comments on: Proof
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: If you "Like" IPR on Facebook, they announce new products on their news feed. Otherwise, check the IPR site or my site in late April. It should be available then.
item.content:encoded: If you “Like” IPR on Facebook, they announce new products on their news feed. Otherwise, check the IPR site or my site in late April. It should be available then.

item.title: By: David 'Doc Blue' Wendt
item.dc:creator: David 'Doc Blue' Wendt
item.description:
I just (belatedly) discovered The Stork on Kickstarter. Did I understand correctly that you intend to release it at IPR? If so, is there anywhere I can sign up to be notified when it is available?
The Stork looks like an incredible idea. I wish I had discovered sooner to help support!
item.content:encoded:
I just (belatedly) discovered The Stork on Kickstarter. Did I understand correctly that you intend to release it at IPR? If so, is there anywhere I can sign up to be notified when it is available?

The Stork looks like an incredible idea. I wish I had discovered sooner to help support!
